Html:
Hi,

Am changing default mouse drag button as follows:

<font size="2">

gMap.DragButton =

</font>

MouseButtons.Left;

That works great. However, nothing in the MouseDoubleClick event will fire (trying this:

gMap.Zoom = gMap.MaxZoom;

and I noticed even the On MarkerClick has an issue as well - sample code: 

gMap.CurrentPosition = item.Position;

<font size="2">

 

</font>

I think the map is watching the left click for drag now and blocking everything else that listens to it... I mean, the events fire, but nothing happens. Anyone have a solution?
